recommendations.title: Contract Optimization - Multi-year
recommendations.description: Account on Enterprise Annual contract with ARR $1,404,790.63. Strong candidate for multi-year agreement to lock in revenue.
recommendations.reasoning: Current contract type (Enterprise Annual) with ARR $1,404,790.63 and strong health score suggests multi-year stability.
specificActions: Review current contract terms and renewal timeline
Prepare multi-year proposal with strategic pricing
Schedule renewal discussion 90 days before expiration
Negotiate mutually beneficial terms with legal review
successFactors: Flexible terms that align with customer needs

recommendations.title: Churn Risk - Immediate Intervention Required
recommendations.description: Account shows multiple risk signals: Low health score (56), Revenue declining (87.4% DM), Renewal in 30 days.
recommendations.reasoning: Health score 56 indicates dissatisfaction. DM% of 87.4% shows revenue contraction. Upcoming renewal creates urgency.
specificActions: Schedule immediate stakeholder meeting to understand concerns
Conduct product usage analysis to identify friction points
Develop 90-day success plan with clear milestones
Assign dedicated CSM resource for intensive support
risks: Customer may have already decided to churn
Product gaps may be difficult to address quickly
successFactors: Quick identification and resolution of pain points
Competitive positioning and product roadmap alignment

recommendations.title: Pricing Recovery Opportunity
recommendations.description: Account pricing has declined 10.5% vs prior year and is 10.5% below peer average. Strategic price adjustment could recover revenue.
recommendations.reasoning: Current ARR: $1,798,094.55, Prior: $2,009,708.53 (-10.5% decline). Peer average DM: 100.0%. This suggests pricing pressure or undervaluation.
specificActions: Conduct competitive pricing analysis within 2 weeks
Schedule executive business review to discuss value delivered
Prepare pricing justification document with ROI metrics
Present pricing adjustment proposal with 30-day notice
risks: May require product/service enhancements to justify
successFactors: Strong demonstrated ROI and value delivery

recommendations.title: Cross-Sell & Expansion Opportunity
recommendations.description: Strong account (health: 77, DM: 96.8%) using only 2 product(s). High potential for product expansion.
recommendations.reasoning: Account demonstrates strong satisfaction and retention (96.8% DM). Currently using CloudSense CPQ Core, Advanced Configuration Engine. Similar accounts typically adopt 4-5 products. ARR of $659,200 suggests budget capacity.
specificActions: Analyze usage patterns to identify expansion opportunities
Schedule product roadmap session with customer stakeholders
Develop custom expansion proposal with ROI projections
Present pilot program for additional products/services
risks: Customer may not see value in additional products
Competitive products may already be in use
